name: Mr. Worm Vs Lake Michigan
description:
I'm excited to announce the creation of Mr. Worm Vs. Lake Michigan! This game is in development. This will be my first game using the Godot engine! In this game you will try your hardest to gather all of the fish in Lake Michigan. See how many you can catch before you fall off the hook!

Credits

I have made all of the assets for this game!

Controls

Use arrow keys to move!
